body: Its just shitty writing anyhow. Repetitive blackmail + retarded woman + turns into whore via donkey kong looking goon we see with gyaru-oh NTR. Boring shit that can't even get me going TL'd or not. Looks like this guy's stuff is basically the same fucking plot. How do these people even make sales? Its the same recycled shit over and over.
I still don't get it, there literally just dating. The most they did here is lock arms with each other, there not even kissing. Tf is high school dating not allowed in Japan???
